metadata.title: CVE-2024-12801 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in SaxEventRecorder by QOS.CH logbackversion 1.5.12 on the Java platform, allows an attacker toforge requests by compromising logback configuration files in XML.The attacks involves the modification of DOCTYPE declaration inÂ  XMLconfiguration files.

criterions.comment: logback package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
